text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Assessment" means an assessment that, subject to § 2-505(c)(3) of this subtitle, equals 60% of the Administration's approved annual budget appropriation under this article.
"Fund" means the Insurance Regulation Fund established under § 2-505 of this subtitle.

section.section: "Health insurer" means an insurer that holds a certificate of authority issued by the Commissioner to engage in the business of health insurance.

"Health insurer" includes:
a health maintenance organization operating under a certificate of authority issued by the Commissioner under Title 19, Subtitle 7 of the Health - General Article;
a nonprofit health service plan operating under Title 14, Subtitle 1 of this article; and
a dental plan operating under Title 14, Subtitle 4 of this article.

text.section: "Health insurer assessment portion" means 40% of the assessment.

section.section: "Insurer" means an insurer or other entity authorized to engage in the insurance business in the State under a certificate of authority issued by the Commissioner.

text.section: "Life insurer" means an insurer that holds a certificate of authority issued by the Commissioner to engage in the business of life insurance.
"Life insurer assessment portion" means 26% of the assessment.

"Multiple type insurer" means an insurer that engages in more than one of the following types of insurance:
life;
health; or
property and casualty.

section.section: "Premium" has the meaning stated in § 1-101 of this article to the extent it is allocable to this State.

"Premium" includes any amounts paid to a health maintenance organization as compensation on a predetermined basis for providing services to members and subscribers as specified in Title 19, Subtitle 7 of the Health - General Article to the extent it is allocable to this State.
"Property and casualty insurer" means an insurer that holds a certificate of authority issued by the Commissioner to engage in the business of property and casualty insurance.
"Property and casualty insurer" includes the Maryland Automobile Insurance Fund.

text.section: "Property and casualty insurer assessment portion" means 34% of the assessment.
